Description: The iT-R shared the exact same engine setup with the i-TEC Sport, with one huge difference. The iT-R is a FWD all wheel steered machine. Apart from the different drivetrain it also has a special iT-R transmission with a 4.4 LSD. It came together with the Covet iT-R. The Pessima, and the Covet were the first iT-R Ibishu cars ever produced.
